Title: Loud & Proud
Plot: Dana is stunned when she learns a big secret about her brother, Howie, at Gay Pride 2005. Mark tries to make amends with Jenny and Shane, Kit and Bette learn that their father, Melvin, is refusing treatment for his illness, and a shocking memory about Jenny's childhood is revealed.
GuestStars: Tyler Johnston,  Linda Ko,  Victoria Billingsley,  Heather Doerksen,  Omari Forrester,  Stephen Aberle,  Andrew Francis,  Gina Stockdale,  Carrie Fleming,  Jenn Forgie,  Cobie Smulders,  Brad Dryborough,  Iris P
